20110120045317.000|20110120045321.000|CC1|LITTLE MORE OUT OF COLLEGE.     
20110120045321.000|20110120045322.000|CC1|ON MY FIRST DAY AT CORNELL IN A 
20110120045322.000|20110120045323.000|CC1|SECRETARY OF DEFENSE-LEVEL
